onboarding.title: Welcome to Habit On!
onboarding.paragraph: Start building better habits today. Whether you want to exercise more, eat healthier, or simply become more organized, we’re here to help you achieve your goals, one habit at a time.

onboarding.title: Track Your Progress
onboarding.paragraph: Easily monitor your daily habits and see your progress over time. Visualize your growth and stay motivated by tracking every step you take towards becoming the best version of yourself.

onboarding.title: Set Personal Goals
onboarding.paragraph: Customize your habit journey. Set daily, weekly, or monthly goals that suit your lifestyle. We’ll remind you to stay on track and celebrate your successes with you.

onboarding.title: Stay Consistent
onboarding.paragraph: Consistency is key. Our app helps you build streaks, providing that extra push to keep your habits alive. Break old habits and build new ones with our support.

onboarding.title: Ready to Start?
onboarding.paragraph: Let’s begin your transformation. With Habit Tracker, creating and maintaining healthy habits has never been easier. Your journey to a better you starts now!
